void dreadtriple ( FILE *  fp,
int_t *  m,
int_t *  n,
int_t *  nonz,
double **  nzval,
int_t **  rowind,
int_t **  colptr 
)

brief

 Output parameters
 =================
   (nzval, rowind, colptr): (*rowind)[*] contains the row subscripts of
      nonzeros in columns of matrix A; (*nzval)[*] the numerical values;
	column i of A is given by (*nzval)[k], k = (*rowind)[i],...,
      (*rowind)[i+1]-1.
